availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel Southard, Sr. (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Emeliza Bussel Southard in Laurel County, Kentucky, on December 27, 1850. Father of Isom Southard, Nathaniel Southard, Jr., Sarah J. Southard, and John W. Southard. Resident of Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1853. Resident of Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1854. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860. Served in the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from October 9, 1861, to October 27, 1864.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Births.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Laurel County Marriages, Film 007728869.
